column4: greetings, I've been experiencing lag while playing videos, how do i fix this issue?
do you have the latest video driver for your video card?
i don't know - how do I check?
do you know what your video card is first off?
type lspci -v in the terminal and then half way up it says probably somthing like VGA compatiable controller and it should tell you what your card is
okay look at that list and you should see something under that VGA part that says. Says "Kernel Driver in use:" whats it say for your ATI card?
Im not real sure about ATI cards, but that sounds like the right driver for your card. Are you talking about videos on your computer or like youtube flash videos?
is it just one site or any flash site?
i recall fixing this once - there was an issue with flash
you can try running the update-manager check if there is a flash video update otherwise you will have to manually install it
your welcome to try that if you want, but honestly never used the program so I wouldnt know on that.
